text: Bruno Aar√≥n Campos (born December 3, 1973) is a Brazilian-American lawyer and former actor, best known for his roles as Dr. Quentin Costa on the award- winning television series Nip/Tuck, the voice of Prince Naveen in the Disney animated movie The Princess and the Frog, various characters on the FOX animated television series The Simpsons and Massimo in the Academy Award- nominated Brazilian movie O Quatrilho. In 2010, Campos attended law school, earning a Juris Doctor in 2013, and currently works for the firm Morgan, Lewis & Bockius. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian voice actors Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American lawyers Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Bruno Campos
